raw_body: GUNESEKERA ASOKA TERRANCE – Loving son of the late Mr and Mrs Bertram Gunesekera of Makawita. Beloved husband of Sriya and loving father of Asanga,​ Chamith and Kushan,​ brother of Nandani and Tissa. Remains will lie at Jayaratne Respect from 9 a.m. on Saturday 21st October 2023. Cortege will leave the Parlour at 4 p.m. for Cremation at 4.30 p.m. at the New Crematorium,​ General Cemetery Kanatte.067577
